weapons.name: Bough of Wyscan
weapons.description: Sylvan Longbow enchantment. Attacks made with this Sylvan Longbow gain +1 to wound when shooting from Short Range, and Magical Attacks.

weapons.name: Lifeseed Feathers
weapons.description: Sylvan Longbow enchantment. Shots always 1. Attacks made with this Sylvan Bow gains Magical Attacks. Instead of firing this Sylvan Longbow as usual, the wielder may apply the following rules instead: - When fired at a target within 10 of the bearer, this Shooting Attack's Strength is set to 4 and Armour Penetration to 1. - When fired at a target more than 10 and up to and including 20 away from the bearer, its Strength is set to 5 and Armour Penetration to 2. - When fired at a target more than 20 and up to and including 30 away from the bearer, its Strength is set to 6 and Armour Penetration to 3 and it gains Multiple Wounds (2).

weapons.name: Spirit of the Whirlwind
weapons.description: Sylvan Blades enchantment. The bearer gains +1 Attack Value, and Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength, Lethal Strike, and Magical Attacks

weapons.name: Hunter's Honour
weapons.description: Spear enchantment. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration, and Magical Attacks. If the bearer causes at least one unsaved wound with this weapon, the bearer and all R&F models in the bearer's unit gain Distracting until the end of the Melee Phase.

armours.name: Shielding Bark
armours.description: Infantry models only. Light Armour enchantment. The wearer gains +1 Armour, Aegis (5+), Fearless, Flammable, and Magical Attacks.

armours.name: Curse of the Black Stag
armours.description: Light Armour enchantment. The bearer gains Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 Att, +1 Def).

artefacts.name: Hail Shot
artefacts.description: Forest Princes and Chieftains only. One use only. When this Artefact is used, it is a Shooting Weapon with the following profile: Range 30, Shots 3D6, Str 4, AP 1, Magical Attacks. Aim is set to 2+. When fired from Short Range it gains +1 Armour Penetration. Master Archer cannot be used in conjunction with Hail Shot.

artefacts.name: Mist Walker's Mirror
artefacts.description: Models on foot only. One use only. If the bearer’s unit consists entirely of Standard Size Infantry models, is unengaged, and is entirely within a Forest Terrain Feature that doesn’t contain any enemy models, the unit may teleport to any other Forest Terrain Feature on the Battlefield. This special movement is resolved at the end of the player’s Movement Phase. When teleporting, the unit must be placed entirely within the target Forest. It may appear in any legal formation but must follow the Unit Spacing rule. The unit counts as having performed a March Move.

artefacts.name: Sacred Seeds
artefacts.description: Models on foot only. One use only. The player may activate this Artefact at the end of any friendly Movement Phase and place a Forest Terrain Feature in contact with the bearer and at least 1 away from any enemy units and other Terrain Features. The Forest may not be larger than 6 in diameter.

artefacts.name: Drums of Cenyrn
artefacts.description: Models on foot only. One use only. May be activated when the bearer’s unit Declares a Charge. The target of the charge may only declare Hold as its Charge Reaction unless it is already fleeing. The enemy unit may still declare Charge Reactions as normal if it is subsequently charged by other units.

artefacts.name: Horn of the Wild Hunt
artefacts.description: One use only. . May be activated when a friendly unit within 8″ fails a roll for Charge Range. The roll may be rerolled.

artefacts.name: Glyph of Amryl
artefacts.description: Cannot be taken by models with Sylvan Spirit. The bearer gains Cannot be Stomped. When Fighting a Duel, the bearer gains +3 Defensive Skill.

standards.name: Banner of Silent Mist
standards.description: The bearer's unit gains Soft Cover. Enemy units within 3 of the bearer's unit may not gain any benefit from a Musician.

standards.name: Banner of Deception
standards.description: At the end of step 4 of the Deployment Phase Sequence (before deploying Scouts), the owning player may remove the bearer's unit from the Battlefield and deploy it again elsewhere (any Characters joined to the unit must remain in the unit; this does not affect the number of Undeployed Units for calculating the starting roll-off bonus).

standards.name: Predator Pennant
standards.description: The bearer's unit gains Devastating Charge (Distracting).

choices.name: Replace Shield and Spear for Elven Cloak and Sylvan Blades
lose Scoring and gain Clearing Spirits
Swap Sylvan Lance for Sylvan Blades

specialrules.specialrule: Wizard Conclave(Master of Earth - Druidism, Break the Spirit - Shamanism, Truth of Time - Cosmology, Forest Embrace - Hereditary Spell)
